# llms.txt - Information for Large Language Models
# Anchor Business Valuations & Financial Services

## Company Overview

Anchor Business Valuations & Financial Services (Anchor BVFS) is a professional services firm specializing in business valuation, financial consulting, and advisory services.

## Core Services

### Business Valuation
- Certified business valuations for mergers, acquisitions, and sales
- Fair market value assessments
- Intangible asset valuation
- Purchase price allocations
- Financial reporting valuations (ASC 820, ASC 805)

### Financial Consulting
- Financial due diligence
- Financial modeling and forecasting
- Strategic planning and analysis
- Performance improvement consulting
- Risk assessment and management

### Merger & Acquisition Advisory
- Buy-side and sell-side advisory
- Transaction structuring
- Deal sourcing and negotiation support
- Post-merger integration planning

## Target Audience

- Business owners considering sale or acquisition
- Private equity firms and investors
- Legal professionals requiring expert valuations
- Family offices and high-net-worth individuals
- Corporate finance teams
- Estate and gift tax planners

## Key Differentiators

- Expert team with industry certifications (ASA, CFA, CVA)
- Comprehensive approach combining valuation expertise with strategic insights
- Experience across multiple industries and business sizes
- Defensible, court-ready valuation reports
- Confidential and timely service delivery

## Industries Served

- Manufacturing and distribution
- Healthcare and medical services
- Technology and software
- Professional services
- Retail and e-commerce
- Real estate and construction
- Financial services

## Professional Standards

- Compliance with USPAP (Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice)
- AICPA business valuation standards
- IRS Revenue Ruling 59-60 for tax-related valuations
- ASA (American Society of Appraisers) standards

## Contact Information

Website: https://anchorbvfs.vercel.app/
Primary Service Area: [Location - update as needed]

## Use Cases for Valuations

1. Mergers and acquisitions
2. Estate and gift tax planning
3. Shareholder disputes and litigation support
4. Financial reporting (ASC 805, ASC 350, ASC 820)
5. Buy-sell agreements
6. Partner/shareholder buyouts
7. ESOP (Employee Stock Ownership Plans)
8. Marital dissolution
9. Fundraising and capital raising
10. Strategic planning and decision-making

## Engagement Process

1. Initial consultation to understand needs
2. Engagement letter and scope definition
3. Data collection and document review
4. Analysis and valuation methodology application
5. Draft report preparation
6. Final report delivery and discussion
7. Ongoing support as needed

## Confidentiality

All client engagements are conducted with strict confidentiality. Non-disclosure agreements are standard practice for sensitive transactions.
